mapper.insert:
insert into tb_parking_space
parking_space_id,
parking_space_location,
parking_space_occupy,
parking_space_question,
parking_space_reservation,
car_id,
expire_date,
#{parkingSpaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{parkingSpaceLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parkingSpaceOccupy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{parkingSpaceQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parkingSpaceReservation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
UPDATE test.tb_parking_space t SET t.parking_space_occupy = 1,
expire_date=date_add(expire_date, interval 1 month ),
expire_date=date_add(expire_date, interval 3 month ),
expire_date=date_add(expire_date, interval 6 month ),
expire_date=date_add(expire_date, interval 12 month ),
car_id=(select car_id from tb_car where car_plate_number=#{car_id}) WHERE t.parking_space_id = #{parking_space_id}

UPDATE test.tb_parking_space t SET t.parking_space_occupy = 1,
expire_date=date_add(now(), interval 1 month ),
expire_date=date_add(now(), interval 3 month ),
expire_date=date_add(now(), interval 6 month ),
expire_date=date_add(now(), interval 12 month ),
car_id=(select car_id from tb_car where car_plate_number=#{car_id}) WHERE t.parking_space_id = #{parking_space_id}
mapper.select: select * from tb_parking_space where parking_space_occupy is null
